posts.body:
>>3bf1148b-55a4-49e0-8f4f-51c093290b96
First hop gets a locked package. I he can open the package with his own key. Inside the package there is another locked package which hes got no key for and which holds an address. So he sends this locked package to the second hop. Rinse/repeat 3rd locked package goes to the exit node. The Exit node can only see a locked package coming from the middle node. Unwraps package and is sending the package to the clearnet address. So 3 is just enough that entry and exit dont know each other. So I theory it's safe. Unless all 3 are hosted by the same NGO at Hetzner Datacenter, kek. 
The good news is, for onion to onion, its another chain of 3 hops on the other end (unless it's one of those new fast hidden services. If you want really long chains with like 5 or 7 hops each side, then you need to look into i2p. But zeronet isn't supporting it (yet?). 
There is that  common misconception - zeronet is, by itself, and never was, about privacy. Zeronet is about not being easily deplatformed by Mr. I-control-the-interwebs. So it has pretty much been made for 8chans situation. Because that is exactly what it does. Prevent Cloudflare Fuckers & friends to easily shut you down. It does _not_ take care of anonymity or privacy (tor has been tacked on later because people kept asking for the feature).

>>fe3d16ed-8b63-4af5-b766-f391ec0b4638
You need Zero IDs to post. That's the bottleneck. While those IDs are somewhat hidden, they are still there. Site owner just needs to limit new registrations. A Board could run its own id service with captcha, buddy invites ... plus zeronet nodes can run as hidden services. That means a good chunk of the DoS is going to hit the tor nodes in front of you. While it's pretty simple to DoS a single onion service, it's  a completely different story to take down an ever changing swarm of torrents. If I wanted to attack 0net, I would go for the trackers. I think thats the weakest point.

>>0bdf9ece-b10e-4860-9aee-8e31105afc98
Ahahaha, like anyone would ever think that crippled dwarf was a nazi, ahahaha
